# eas_project (Resource)

Project Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "eas_project" "project" {
  name = "MyFirstProject"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID
- `owner` (String) Owner
